title: my account in 2k14
body: what if i told you i had an account from seaosn 2 that i forgot about in season 4. and it just tells me i need to change my password cause of the new system ect. but my email was hacked many years ago and i would like to change it anyways the support seems to not be usefull

replies.body: i got a respond from support thanks for the help rito

We'd like to help!  Send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can take a look!  We should be able to help update and recover the account, as long as you can verify ownership per our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
also i want to meantion the emails are almost the same name ect so i hope thats also some proves to that
